thread.title: EPRT stock hits all-time high at $33.95 amid robust growth By Investing.com
thread.title_full: EPRT stock hits all-time high at $33.95 amid robust growth By Investing.com

author: Investing.com
title: EPRT stock hits all-time high at $33.95 amid robust growth By Investing.com
text:
Essential Properties Realty Trust (NYSE: EPRT ) stock soared to an all-time high of $33.95, marking a significant milestone for the real estate investment trust. This peak reflects a remarkable 1-year change, with the company's stock value surging by 44.46%. Investors have shown increased confidence in EPRT's portfolio of properties and its ability to generate stable rental income, which has been a driving force behind the stock's impressive performance. The company's strategic acquisitions and effective management have contributed to its robust growth, positioning it favorably in the competitive real estate market.
In other recent news, Essential Properties Realty Trust (EPRT) showcased a robust Q2 performance in 2024, with significant growth driven by $334 million in investments. This resulted in a 5% rise in Adjusted Funds from Operations (AFFO) per share. The company maintained a high occupancy rate of 99.8% and a weighted average lease term of 14.1 years. Despite these positive indicators, EPRT's guidance for AFFO per share for 2024 remains unchanged, ranging from $1.72 to $1.75.
The company also secured a $450 million term loan, enhancing its financial standing. Emphasizing its conservative leverage and substantial liquidity, which stands at over $1.1 billion, EPRT is well-positioned. The company plans to reposition vacant assets, including Red Lobster properties, through lease or sale.
EPRT expects increased mergers and acquisitions activity in the latter half of the year as capital markets stabilize. The company's focus on maintaining a conservative financial profile, coupled with its proactive approach to managing its portfolio, positions it to navigate the evolving market landscape effectively.
InvestingPro Insights
Essential Properties Realty Trust (EPRT) has not only hit its stride in the market, but InvestingPro data and insights suggest there is more to the story. With a market capitalization of $5.97 billion, EPRT's financial health appears robust. A notable InvestingPro Tip highlights that EPRT has raised its dividend for six consecutive years, showcasing a commitment to returning value to shareholders. This is further supported by a solid dividend yield of 3.45%, which is particularly attractive to income-focused investors.
Additionally, EPRT's revenue growth is impressive, with a 27.61% increase over the last twelve months as of Q2 2024. This growth trajectory is echoed in the quarterly figures, with a 26.3% rise in the same period. Such performance is a testament to the company's strategic acquisitions and operational effectiveness.
Investors may also find the company's profitability reassuring, as EPRT has been profitable over the last twelve months. Analysts are optimistic, predicting that the company will maintain profitability in the current year. For those considering an investment, there are 19 additional InvestingPro Tips available, offering in-depth analysis and guidance on EPRT's prospects.
Overall, EPRT's strong fundamentals and positive outlook may continue to be a magnet for investors seeking both growth and stability in the real estate investment sector.
